fields.label: City Code
fields.name: city_code
fields.instructions: This is the 2 or 3 character city code used for the maps.

fields.label: Number of Data Centers
fields.name: number_of_data_centers
fields.instructions: Enter the total number of Data Centers at this location.

fields.label: Enable Single Page?
fields.name: enable_single_page
fields.instructions: This will add the link to this Data Center's individual page.

fields.label: Enable FAQ Page?
fields.name: enable_faq_page
fields.instructions: This will add the link to this Data Center's FAQ page.

fields.label: Display Data Sheet Link?
fields.name: display_data_sheet
fields.instructions: This option will add a link to the data sheet, otherwise only the data center page will be shown on the map.

fields.label: Is Regional Headquarters?
fields.name: is_regional_headquarters
fields.instructions: Set this to true to assign this location as the regional headquarters. It will display as a blue pin on the map instead of a red pin.

fields.label: Hide From Global Map?
fields.name: hide_from_global_map
fields.instructions: Set this to true to hide this item from the global map module.

fields.label: Add to Global Map?
fields.name: add_to_global_map
fields.instructions: Toggle this field on if this is a new data center location (after 08/2023) and a pin needs to be added to the map.

fields.label: Global Left Value
fields.name: global_left_value
fields.instructions: X-Axis position on the map in pixels.

fields.label: Global Top Value
fields.name: global_top_value
fields.instructions: Y-Axis position on the map in pixels.

sub_fields.label: Display This Location
sub_fields.name: display_this_location
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle this on to display only this location. Make sure all other locations in this data center do not have this field turned on.

fields.label: Hide Map
fields.name: hide_map
fields.instructions: Check this if there is no google map address and you need to hide the map module.
